lead_paragraph: In 1987, young Ice Cube, Dr. Dre, Eazy-E, DJ Yella and MC Ren turned their frustration and anger about life in Compton into the most powerful weapon they had: their music.
snippet: In 1987, young Ice Cube, Dr. Dre, Eazy-E, DJ Yella and MC Ren turned their frustration and anger about life in Compton into the most powerful weapon they had: their music.
